comments.body: Just wondering if the fragment should include a non 7bit string (i.e. something like Ã¨ as in the original bug report )?  I guess the characters that test this could be in the file already but it might make the purpose of the test clearer.
@jhawkesworth made changes to names of the files and the names of the  tasks to  more  clearly represent the test's intent. Hope that is more clear.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +93,97 @@    xpath: '/plane/year'
    type: text
    fragment: '1988'

- name: register the sha1 of the new file
